snippet: SEFF--Gloria Nelson, died on January 7, 2016 at the age of 90. Beloved mother of Liane B. Onish. Stepmother of Barbara. Sister of Miriam. Aunt of Janet and Robert. Contributions in her name may be made to Planned Parenthood or Hunter College Mother's Day Fund. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SEFF--Gloria Nelson, died on January 7, 2016 at the age of 90. Beloved mother of Liane B. Onish. Stepmother of Barbara. Sister of Miriam. Aunt of Janet and Robert. Contributions in her name may be made to Planned Parenthood or Hunter College Mother's Day Fund. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SEFF, GLORIA NELSON
